    Package Description
    org.activity.jmotif.distance
    Implements distance methods.

    Implements SAX algorithm.
    org.activity.jmotif.sax.alphabet
    Implements SAX alphabets.
    org.activity.jmotif.timeseries
    Provides an implementation of the datastructures for the time-series.
